alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 1:19PM PST until January 10 at 6:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 7500 FEET... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches above 6000 feet, 4 to 8 inches above 7500 feet, with 1 to 2 feet on the highest peaks. Winds gusting as high as 75 mph. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains. * WHEN...Through 6 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will lower all afternoon into the evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
